Vector b 
0.5949 0.2622 0.2622 0.6028 0.6028 0.7112 0.7112 0.2217 0.2217 0.1174 0.1174 0.2967 0.2967 0.3188 0.3188 0.4242 0.4242 0.5079 Funciones interpolantes + 
1.0x+2.0     1.0<= x >= 2.0
3.0x+4.0     2.0<= x >= 3.0
5.0x+6.0     3.0<= x >= 4.0
7.0x+8.0     4.0<= x >= 5.0
9.0x+10.0     5.0<= x >= 6.0
